name: P.S. It gets better
description:
There are days that you climb mountains and slay dragons. There are days that you manage to get out of bed and get dressed; and it's ok. This is your adventure. Conquering castles of piles of clothes. Be kind to yourself. Embrace it. You got this. A 2D point and click mini-game fighting the hardest struggles of life.

"P.S. It gets better" was developed for the Global Game Jam 2021, under the theme "Lost and Found". In it you are not looking for lost objects, but rather you are trying to find your "lost" self. This game is dedicated to people that suffer from depression.

All the assets used where created by the artists of the team.
